Package org.nlpub.watset.wsi

Class SenseInduction<V,​E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nlpub.watset.wsi.SenseInduction<V,​E>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - node class.
    E - edge class.
    public class SenseInduction<V,​E>
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple graph-based word sense induction approach. It clusters node neighborhoods.
    See Also:
    Dorow & Widdows (EACL '03)
